channel.title: Help with richscape cilent
channel.description: Here is the error when I click run. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Help with richscape cilent
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:6, topic:218529”]Right click your run client file. Click edit. Replace EGUI with client
Reopen.[/quote]

I did this.
Still get same error.

@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
color 0a
JAVA -Xmx500m cilent
PAUSE

Read full topic

item.title: Help with richscape cilent
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Right click your run client file. Click edit. Replace EGUI with client
Reopen.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with richscape cilent
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:4, topic:218529”][quote author=ugetpkd link=topic=287152.msg2323485#msg2323485 date=1215588648]

Please tell me you have read the fucking error. If you have, your question would be self-answered.
In you run batch replace EGUI with client or whatever the main class is.

No clue what you said,I took a 4 year break on java…
[/quote]
Except anyone can read an error and figure out that it says no class found.
Mostly anyone can edit a file and change EGUI to client. You don’t need to know Java to do the above.[/quote]

Give me instructions on how to do it?
Edit: trying something.
PLEase tell me how to do it,I can’t think right.
ITs like 100 in my freaking car.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with richscape cilent
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“ugetpkd, post:3, topic:218529”][quote author=Hidendra link=topic=287152.msg2323465#msg2323465 date=1215588232]
Please tell me you have read the fucking error. If you have, your question would be self-answered.
In you run batch replace EGUI with client or whatever the main class is.
[/quote]

No clue what you said,I took a 4 year break on java…[/quote]
Except anyone can read an error and figure out that it says no class found.
Mostly anyone can edit a file and change EGUI to client. You don’t need to know Java to do the above.

Read full topic
